RINGS
settings.description:
Since its beginnings in 2003, engagement rings have been at the core of My Jewel World. Today, we're honoured to assist you in continuing to commemorate your love story with a ring that reflects your individuality. Our conflict-free diamonds are all responsibly sourced and created with outstanding craftsmanship to our rigorous standards, in a variety of styles and settings ranging from classical solitaires to modern halo designs.

A ring can be a symbol of practically anything you want it to be, whether it's a symbol of love or an everlasting friendship. Thankfully, we have a beautiful assortment of rings for you to choose from to commemorate any occasion, whether it's for yourself or a loved one. Choose from gorgeous white gold rings or an extravagant platinum band for your loved one that will be cherished their favourite in their jewellery box for years to come

settings.title: EARRINGS
settings.description: Divulge yourself in our large collection of earrings whether it is to treat yourself or a loved one you'll be sure to find the earrings for you. We at My Jewel World believe earrings are the most essential accessories to complete any outfit and you'll be sure to find a pair in our collection as we have a wide selection from stud earrings, hoop earrings, drop earrings, solitaire earrings, sparkling crystal and diamond earrings and much more. With an array of style to choose from, we have designs which our timeless classic to fancy cluster earrings and one-off pieces you will be sure to find the earrings you can wear time and time again.

settings.title: BRACELETS
settings.description: Whether you're shopping for yourself or a loved one, you'll be sure to discover the perfect bracelet in our extensive collection. Bracelets are a vital accessory to complete any outfit, and you'll be sure to find one that will grace your wrist among our large selection of tennis bracelets, curb bracelets, ornate bracelets, cluster bracelets, and more at My Jewel World. With so many styles to pick from, from timeless classics to detailed works of art and one-of-a-kind pieces, you'll be sure to find a bracelet you'll want to wear again and again.

settings.title: NECKLACES
settings.description: If it's time to spoil that important loved one in your life, browse My Jewel World's extensive collection of exquisite ladies' and mens' necklaces. There will be something here that they will treasure for a lifetime and make the perfect gift for a birthday, anniversary, or just because, and it will be available in a variety of styles and designs. Choose from a variety of gorgeous diamond and sapphire necklaces that will never go out of style. With so many options, there's never been a better time to shop our collection of women's and men's necklaces.

settings.title: WATCHES
settings.description: Treat yourself to a pre-owned watch from one of the world's most prestigious brands. At My Jewel World, we provide a large range of certified pre-owned men's and women's watches at affordable prices from brands like Rolex, OMEGA, Cartier, TAG Heuer, Breitling, and others. Those looking for the most recent additions can check out our New Arrivals page to discover what used watches have arrived in the last week. We're likely to have something for sale that suits you, with a large choice of colours and styles to choose from.

settings.text1: How do i return an item
settings.content:
To return or exchange your jewellery all you need to do is request a returns form and well arrange for the return of your item, free* of charge when it is an exchange only.

Please email us athelp@myjewelworld.co.ukwith your name and order number. Well email you back with a return form and further instructions on how to return your item to us.

Your item must be returned in the same condition as when you receive it. The item must also be unmodified, with all packaging and tags attached for us to be able to process your refund.


To be eligible for a return, your item must be unused and in the same condition that you received it. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. All customised and engraved items are non returnable or exchangeable. If any other item is not returnable you would be contacted prior to us processing your order.

settings.text1: How long to refunds take to process?
settings.content:
Once we receive your jewellery back and have had the chance to unpack and inspect it, we will immediately issue you with a refund.

Refunds can take 3-5 working days to show up on your card, bank or PayPal balance, this is not down to us, it simply depends on how long it takes for your card company to process the refund.

Please note that you must print and include the returns form that we send you with the jewellery that your sending back.

If you dont included the returns form inside the package, we wont know whos returned the item therefore resulting in delays whilst we locate the order.

settings.text1: What payment method is used for refunds?
settings.content: We always issue refunds back to the same tender used when purchasing your item.

settings.text1: I've ordered the wrong size ring, can it be resized?
settings.content:
We advise all our clients to get their ring sizes checked before purchase, but if you happen to purchase a ring and it turns out to be the incorrect size we are usually able to resize the ring for you. This service has a standard cost starting from 39.00. The exact cost will vary according to the amount of adjustment and style of the ring.

Please note certain rings, such as full eternity rings cannot be resized (returned or exchanged).

If you need any advise on ring sizes before or after your purchase please call us and speak to one of our experts on 0800 520 0084

Here at My Jewel World we offer you a lifetime manufactures guarantee on all of our jewellery. If you believe there are any defects or bad craftsmanship in the making of our jewellery, you may return it to us for inspection. If we determine your product is damaged due to a manufacturing defect, we will repair the product or, if we deem appropriate, replace the item.

If we determine that your product is not damaged by a manufacturing defect then we will notify you and let you know if repair services are available at cost.

If for any reason your item arrives damaged or defective please notify us within 24 hours of receiving your order and we will arrange a free return so we can rectify the item purchased or issue you a full refund once the item is returned back to us. Please note that customised or bespoke items cannot be refunded.

If you need to get in touch with us please see our details below:

Email us:help@myjewelworld.co.uk

Or call us on: 0800 158 5597 or from outside the United Kingdom on +44 800 158 5597

Normal trading hours:

Sales Team:

9am - 10pm Monday - Thursday

9am - 2pm Friday

11am - 6pm Sunday

Customer Services / Returns Authorisations:

9am - 10pm Monday - Thursday

9am - 2pm Friday

11am - 6pm Sunday

We may sometime work longer hours, so you are welcome to try us at any time.

Our postal address:

My Jewel World

London Diamond Bourse,

100 Hatton Garden

London

EC1N 8NX (NO RETURNS TO THIS ADDRESS WITHOUT NOTIFYING OUR CUSTOMER SERVICE TEAM)

settings.richtxt: We offer free* worldwide returns, refunds and exchanges on all of our products for up to 30 days after you've received your item.
